item.title: Launch the verifier
item.description: Select either 'Device' or 'TestBench' components, right-click, in the context menu select Launch Verifier. Check both components and select Debug

item.title: Run the model
item.description: Expand the 'Simple System' project in Session Explorer view, select the 'test' function, right-click, then in the context menu select Execute

item.title: Stop verifier
item.description: From the Debug view, click the red square button in order to terminate the verifier
